name: DON'T TRIP
description:
Welcome to DON'T TRIP! 

This rage inducing game is about a square who likes to disobey the laws of physics.

 Complete the levels and WATCH OUT FOR SPIKES! 

Make sure that you DON'T TRIP!

W, Up Arrow Key or Spacebar to jump, A or Left Arrow Key to move left, W or Right Arrow Key to move right.
